law.catch_line: Foreman of grand jury -- Oath to witnesses.
law.text: The grand jurors shall elect one (1) of their members to be foreman. The foreman shall administer an oath to each witness who testifies before the grand jury, substantially as follows: "Do you swear or affirm that you will tell the truth, the whole truth, and nothing but the truth?".
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 449, sec. 10, effective October 1, 1982. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 36, effective January 2, 1978.
